mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, settleDate, discountType, discountInterest, discountDays, discountAmount, tsc,tsu
mapper.select: SELECT hs.id, hs.orderId, hs.hsId, hs.settleDate, hs.discountType, hs.discountInterest, hs.discountDays, hs.discountAmount, tsc, tsu, sum(buyer.amount), sum(buyer.money), sum(buyer.settleGap) FROM hs_same_settle_seller seller JOIN hs_same_settle_buyer buyer ON seller.hsId = buyer.hsId AND seller.orderId = buyer.orderId WHERE seller.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 GROUP BY seller.orderId

select
from hs_same_settle_seller LEFT JOIN hs_same_settle_buyer buyer on seller.hsId = buyer.hsId and seller.orderI的= buyer.orderId where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_same_settle_seller ( id, orderId, hsId, settleDate, discountType, discountInterest, discountDays, discountAmount, tsc) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into hs_same_settle_seller
id, orderId, hsId, settleDate, discountType, discountInterest, discountDays, discountAmount, tsc,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_same_settle_seller SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, settleDate = #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, discountType = #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discountInterest = #{discountInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discountDays = #{discountDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discountAmount = #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
